description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. This controversial long lost research project conducted by Ska Studios and Neurologische Entwicklung GmbH is available now on XBLIG! The subject of heavy criticism from ethicists and pragmatists alike, Viking's "Adaptive Neurothreading" technology allows for unprecedented aura connectivity, but at what cost?
